title: Darmin Reyes - FullStack Developer
description: FullStack Developer from the Dominican Republic. Specialist in CSS5, JavaScript ES6+, Node.js, Java, C++, Python, and Ruby.

hero.title: Hello, I'm Darmin Reyes!
hero.description: Specialist in CSS5, JavaScript ES6+, Node.js, Java, C++, Python, and Ruby.

jobs_description.title: FullStack Developer
jobs_description.description: I have been a freelance FullStack developer since 2021, with expertise in CSS5, JavaScript ES6+, Node.js, Java, C++, Python, and Ruby. I specialize in creating robust, efficient, and scalable applications and systems for both frontend and backend.

jobs_description.title: FrontEnd Developer
jobs_description.description: I was responsible for developing websites for local clients. During my time at the company, I contributed my knowledge to creating modern designs focused on user needs. I also developed systems for local businesses, such as supermarkets, restaurants, and warehouses.

projects.title: Brutal Restaurant
projects.description: Design for Brutal Restaurant, one of the most popular local restaurants. Now they have a modern website with an excellent user experience.

projects.title: RetailPro
projects.description: RetailPro is a system for supermarkets developed in Java. It has a robust structure, making it easy to maintain and scale, as well as a modern and minimalist interface.

contributions.title: Boxy CSS Framework
contributions.description: In collaboration with a group of volunteer developers from all over LATAM, I was part of the Boxy CSS project, a CSS Framework focused on simplicity in code without losing the essence of style.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: I'm Darmin Reyes, a freelancer and Software Development student at ITLA.
about.description: I am a FullStack and Desktop Applications Developer with over 3 years of experience, specializing in creating modern designs and optimizing web performance, as well as scalable and robust backends. My expertise focuses on technologies such as JavaScript ES6+, Ruby, Java, Python, and C++. I work with frameworks like React, Vue JS, Astro, Next, Angular, Node.js, and Express, as well as databases like SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Astro DB, Turso, among others. Additionally, I have experience with graphic design tools, project management, and more, including Figma, Adobe XD, Photoshop, Illustrator, Notion, Git, Trello, and others.
